title: Taking Makeup Off Just Got EASIER and FASTER | Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water
description: Love waterproof eyeliner, cry-proof mascara, and sweat-proof foundation? So do we! That's why we created a Micellar Cleansing Water formula that gently and effectively removes even your most stubborn waterproof makeup.

asset.author: GarnierUSA
asset.description:
Love waterproof eyeliner, cry-proof mascara, and sweat-proof foundation? So do we! That's why we created a Micellar Cleansing Water formula that gently and effectively removes even your most stubborn waterproof makeup. 

Learn more about Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Waterproof: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/skincare/micellar-cleansing-water/micellar-cleansing-water/micellar-cleansing-water-all-in-1-waterproof.aspx

Learn more about Micellar Water: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/skincare/micellar-cleansing-water.aspx

To learn more about Garnier SkinActive: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/skincare.aspx

transcripts: love wearing makeup? But hate taking it off garnier skin active has a different way Micellar cleansing water for waterproof makeup the Garnier Micelles act like a magnet removing even stubborn makeup without harsh rubbing, leave skin refreshed micellar cleansing water from Garnier's skin active.
